p: The essential oil was tested for a possible toxicological effect obtaining an LD 50 in mice of 316 mg/kg, i.p. The results showed that T. lucida produced lower toxicity in comparison to other Tagetes species already reported, with a toxic dose of 99.6 mg/kg for T. erecta and 112 mg/kg for T. patula, per os (p.o.) [ 36].
